name: Moo, Moo, Eat, Poo
description:
It's a poo game!

This farm's strange animals needs some recipe crafting done. Help out by eating items, mixing them up in your stomach, and allowing them to ... become something new! Mix correct items together, make new items! Mix things that shouldn't mix, then just make some 💩. Keep going until forever for MAXIMUM CAPACITY ∞.

Play single player on your keyboard with comma/space (to start and eat), arrow keys/wasd (to move), and q/escape (to quit).

Play INFINITY ∞ multiplayer™ with as many usb controllers as you can plug in.

Made by Lisa Walkosz-Migliacio and Victor Thompson.

Made for #trainjam2016. No farm animals, giraffes, or alligators were harmed in the making of this game.
